select wa.id, wa.work_name, wa.work_content, employee.emp_name as submitter, wa.work_instructor, wa.work_minutes, sc.`name` as workFrom, wa.audit_submit_time, wa.origin_work_id, wa.work_from as fromCode, `user`.id as submitterId from work_audit_detail as wad left join work_audit as wa on wad.audit_item_id=wa.id left join `user` on wa.work_user_id=`user`.id left join employee on employee.id=`user`.employee_id left join sys_config as sc on wa.work_from=sc.code where wa.work_user_id in( select `user`.id from `user` left join employee on employee.id=`user`.employee_id
employee.dept_number like #{deptNumber} and employee.emp_job not like '经理') and wad.audit_status='unaudited'
and wa.work_name like "%"#{workName}"%"
order by wa.audit_submit_time desc

select count(*) from ( select wa.id from work_audit_detail as wad left join work_audit as wa on wad.audit_item_id=wa.id left join `user` on wa.work_user_id=`user`.id left join employee on employee.id=`user`.employee_id left join sys_config as sc on wa.work_from=sc.code where wa.work_user_id in( select `user`.id from `user` left join employee on employee.id=`user`.employee_id
employee.dept_number like #{deptNumber} and employee.emp_job not like '经理') and wad.audit_status='unaudited'
and wa.work_name like "%"#{workName}"%"
) a
